short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Natural Language Processing to summarize news articles, research papers, blog posts, or long comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Return the key sentences in any set of highlighted text.  If no text is selected, it will be applied to the entire article instead.  Adjust the desired length and analysis algorithm through the browser menu.
